caption: Nothing to get excited about.  Outside dining on a beautiful day.  Food was ok, service was acceptable.
The chicken and waffles was AMAZING!! The host Cash very helpful and kind!! It was splendid!
Excellent service!
Great view! Everyone was very friendly! Great food and desert

The service was horrible, we had to approach the waiter to take our order after staring at him for over 20 minutes to grab his attention.   Non apologetic, just straight to: what's your order? Placed order and no joke nearly 1 hour before …

This place was lovely! The food was very good, I had the low country benedict which was delicious. The service was rather slow but we were in no rush, enjoying the beautiful view and scenery this place offers.

Hours are different on the phone versus online. Said they were open on Tuesday's when you call and that GrubHub will deliver. Processed an order and when it was picked up by a Grubhub driver, I received a text saying that the order was …
Great spot for brunch! The food was amazing and the staff very friendly.
A very charming building.
Shrimp and grits were amazing - great view outside.
Food was really good.  They were under-staffed, but the waiter was working hard and did a great job

Marys Cottage is a quaint restaurant located on the edge of falls park downtown Greenville. I've been there a number of times. The food and service is exceptional. There is a number of outdoor tables, and I recommend eating outside if the weather is right. You will not be disappointed.

This place is amazing I ordered the French toast it came with fresh fruit and it complemented the breakfast perfectly!  The location is beautiful I really recommend this place if your in need of a happy peaceful breakfast ❤️

Food was acceptable but service was terrible. They opened 15 minutes past advertised opening time. Coffee was served room temperature and food took 40 minutes to arrive, also served cold. We were only helped if we flagged someone down and we had to get up and ask for our check twice. Very disappointing after a previous good experience.
We came here for brunch on a Sunday; had a bit of a wait but completely understandable for a holiday weekend.  The food and views were wonderful as were the staff.  We had a great time!
Great location, good food & service

To be honest, it has always seemed a bit short staffed as it can take a super long to be served here. HOWEVER, the staff is always so kind and the food is excellent. You cannot beat the location either! I would just recommend planning to spend a little longer than you would typically plan for.

SUCH POTENTIAL!! We came in for Sunday brunch and were seated immediately. Unfortunately our table hadn’t been bussed yet but the nice host quickly took care of that. We sat on the upstairs patio and the view was amazing especially when …

2 stars that should be 4 or 5 stars.  I had a party of 13 people reserved for 945am. When we arrived, the tables were set and ready. Beautiful views of the falls, park, and towering trees. It has a beautiful atmosphere for a relaxing Sunday …

Beautiful location! Attentive staff. Food is to die for. Large portions. We had our third bridal luncheon here this past weekend and it was amazing as always. We got our favorite, fountain inn salad, and ordered their strawberry cake (most …

I recommend as a beautiful setting for lunch.  However, hosted an event with 21 people at Mary's Cottage. I do not recommend this as an event venue. The event coordinator would take sometimes a week to respond to questions. Only then …
Great location, great service, great food.

This is such a fun place to eat! It has a beautiful interior looking over a beautiful park. They staff is always extremely attentive & the food is incredible. Make sure you order the fried green tomatoes! Definitely the best thing on the menu. 1000/10!!
Ambiance.  Great Food choices for brunch courteous staff

Had a nice lunch while in town visiting. Nice club sandwich. I had the orzo salad which I normally love but I would probably try something different next time. Cute little restaurant. Beautiful area. Friendly service.
Great sandwiches for lunch. Nice view of park from back balcony.
Great breakfast, make sure you sit up top
Went to a wedding there, had a great time, friendly staff.
Good food but get seething with a view of the falls..not enough parking 😞
We enjoyed the BLT, crab cake sandwich and the inn salad. Good was delicious. Service was average
Meat loaf sandwich was soooo good. Really cool historic place to grab a good bite to eat, outside or inside!

Mary's Cottage is a very nice place to eat. The atmosphere is so nice. Kent is a great guy and deserves to be the owner...very hard worker. He is so dedicated to what he does and is such a pleasant individual.
Attended a private event on the patio.  Fantastic!
Great relaxing atmosphere.  We sat outside on the upstairs balcony.  Good service. I had the chicken salad on a croissant which was very good..
We had our wedding at Mary's and it was perfect from planning to the event itself! They help every step of the way. The location, the service, and the food were impeccable!
Wonderful food!
Great little setting... Food is good too...
Always good. Great simple food with wonderful atmosphere and an amazing view
We love Mary's. And the new owner who has been a waiter here has been w them from the beginning
Wonderful lunch on the patio! The front hostess Beth was very impressive - did everything except cook.
It's by far..my favorite....delish food..great service and a fabulous atmosphere!!!
We had a great experience there yesterday for a wedding and reception. Very accommodating and good food all around.
Amazing food and service.
excellent brunch and beautiful view of the park and creek

I attended my future daughter-in-law's bridal shower on April 6, 2019 at Mary's. A shower hostess made arrangements; she didn't receive what she arranged. It is my understanding she spoke with the server & also, emailed Mary's regarding the …
Beautiful venue for a wedding
This is the most adorable place in Greeneville. When we visited, the weather was beautiful so we were able to eat up on the balcony.  The chicken salad was amazing, along with the view.
Great service from James, excellent views on the balcony, charming interior and the chicken salad croissant with a cup of soup is a great lunch on a rainy day.
Love this place !!!!!

This was fine. The location was absolutely gorgeous, but the food was passable. When in the South, a restaurant that describes their grits as creamy, should serve truly creamy grits. These were gritty and wet. The goat cheese biscuits were …
Amazing food, great service. Favorite brunch place.
Small, intimate dining.
Amazing location! Right on Fall’s Park. You can even hear the waterfalls. Not the best bennys I’ve had, but all else was superb!

I am embarrassed that I have not written this review sooner.  Mary's at Fall's Cottage was host to my son's rehearsal dinner in November and I absolutely cannot say enough about how wonderful the Mary's Cottage staff was to work with.  Even …
Love it, would give a 5 if they offered cocktails.
Delicious food. Many sandwich and salad options along with tasty sides. Their chicken salad is amazing.
Just great!! Mary's "Arnold Palmer" is one of the best I've ever had!!!
The entree was delicious but dessert was less than good. They offered a brownie with ice cream but the ice cream was melted. They should have excluded it from the menu.

A+++ FOOD was first class! Service was above board. Cost is unexpectedly average. What a beautiful place with a spectacular view of the park, which it over looks. You can park on the street or in the lot next to it and walk right in the park.

Beautiful outdoor brick patio dining area overlooking the garden area above Falls park.  Great southern food and atmosphere.  If you come here you need to get the broccoli salad as one of your sides, one of the best foods I have ever eaten!

The food and the atmosphere here is very good. I got their famous Fountain Inn salad and enjoyed the chicken salad best of all. My daughter got the pimento cheese blt on sourdough and really liked it. We sat on the balcony overlooking Falls …

I haven't had the pleasure of dining inside the actual restaurant yet, but they catered lunch for my office once and I must admit....the food was absolutely SCRUMPTIOUS!!! I had never heard of them before, but I was impressed so much with …
🤩 Amazing view
A touch of southern charm amongst the many trendy restaurants downtown. Need to give the broccoli salad a try.

(Translated by Google) Great place to try the local flavors. Menu for all tastes. Great warm attention from the staff. Reasonable prices according to the high quality of its products.  (Original) Gran lugar para probar los sabores locales. …
Ecellent for Breakfast, nice view on 2nd floor

We had a wonderful lunch today at Mary’s. This was the first time for my husband and two year old daughter. We all enjoyed the food and beautiful view from the patio seating. We will definitely be back!

Had lunch outside Tuesday, what a beautiful venue but that doesn't compare to the food. Fantastic! Service was very professional and efficient, we had a 1:45 reservation and you close at 2. Never felt pressured to eat and leave. I had the …
Excellent food and service. Sit outside for the wonderful views.

We enjoy sitting on the balcony, overlooking Falls park. The food is quite tasty. The atmosphere is casual, allowing for dressing up or down. Parking is free in the lot to the immediate right of the cottage.
Good food and service. Right next to Falls park which adds to the ambience.
Food, service, location and atmosphere terrific! Good prices. We sat on the balcony and overlooked Falls Park. Highly recommended for a tasty lunch.
Charming venue with delicious but overpriced food. Very friendly hostess but unhelpful wait staff.
Staff was very nice and patient. I ordered the BBQ Quesadilla and it was delish. If I'm ever in the Greenville area again I'll get that again.
Love it ! The key lime pie was delicious. Would go back again for lunch or dinner
Absolutely delightful! Reasonable prices.
Nice place
Beautiful, Delicious and charming
Great service and the food was taste bud orgasmikk

This is a great spot for breakfast if you get to eat up on the terrace.  Great view of the park and the river.  Food was great and the service was excellent.  There are a few free parking spots if you eat here.
Super cute cottage on the park with great views and good food.
Beautiful view, amazing menu.
Fantastic food, wonderful view, just a great experience overall.

Wonderful Sunday brunch. Outstanding atmosphere, we ate on the back porch. The food was excellent, try the shrimp and grits, if you like that sort of thing. Defenantly a place to experience of toy are inn Greenville SC!

Go for the fantastic view and the incredible grits. Don’t expect too much from other brunch offerings. Meal pace is relaxed (read slower service). At least the staff was friendly when we had to request they take an omelet back for being …
Always great

Stopped at Mary's for brunch today.   After being told it would be a 30 minute wait for a table outside we decided to check with the hostess after waiting 40 minutes.   What we found was our name crossed off the waiting list.     Now that …

I had heard great things about this restaurant. Unfortunately, when I needed to take some elderly people in wheelchairs to eat there those things quickly vanished from my mind after my experience. I called to make sure they had space for …

Every time we visit Greenville, SC, Mary's is a must.  Located on the falls campus, this is the perfect Greenville lunch destination. The atmosphere is comfortable, relaxing and  inviting.  The staff makes you feel pampered. Then there's …
Although we arrived near closing, we were treated well and not hurried. The lunch was delicious.

I love this place. The menu is a bit limited because they don't have a full kitchen in this historic building. But what they do serve is fantastic. The views are amazing- ask for a porch table. The staff are long time and loyal which says a …
Cute little place, would be great for a small wedding or corporate luncheon
Great food, great service. Always the best!
We love the Sunday brunch, and the views from the patio and porch are just perfect!!

Disappointing is the only thing I can say. I called the location multiple times to get information about having my wedding and ceremony held here.  When someone FINALLY answered they informed me that someone else handles wedding information …
One of the coolest locations for a restaurant! View is great and food is different from the rest of downtown!
Beautiful place to have a weekend brunch or lunch with family.
Great spot to meet the ladies on the weekend. Friendly staff and beautiful location.

What a beautiful location!  This is a small and intimate restaurant.  The staff is very attentive.  My only gripe is that the menu is a little bit limited for my tastes.  But it is plenty popular with the older female members of my family.

We sat outside for Saturday brunch and enjoyed the view of falls park in the shade of gorgeous trees and beautiful landscaping. Our food came out exactly as requested and was very quick. Everything was delicious and we will definitely return!
What an experience,  or waiter was very attentive, the view amazing, and the food tasty. I have and will continue to recommend Mary's.

Recommended Mary's to my boss on his drive back from Charlotte today. I've only been to Mary's once, about 2 years ago and I hoped it was still wonderful. He loved it. I even got an effusive email from a Board of Director's member who was …

Enjoyed a wedding shower lunch put on here.  It was a beautiful setting on the second floor indoors for the meal.  They allowed us to go outside on the second floor porch for the opening of the wedding shower gifts.  The server was very …

We have always wanted to try this place since moving to Greenville. It has a great location, right downtown overlooking the park. We also wanted to scope it out as a potential rehearsal dinner location. We went here for brunch on a Saturday …
Great celebration venue and food is good. Its small and quaint and is nestled right on the Falls park.
Went their with son and daughter in law, it was fabulous, service was supreme with Steven, we'll definitely be back again, will mention Mary's to everyone who comes to visit as well.

Outstanding overall experience for our bridesmaids' brunch on July 27, 2016.  The atmosphere was an elegant garden party, the staff was professional, the service excellent, and the food was delicious.  Mary's at Falls Cottage was a …

The hostess name lauren made us wait aroun 20 minutes just because we were missing one person in our party she mention it was the Restaurat rules with a tempeture of 96° not so good in my opinion i do understand you cant hold tables or wait …
Have eaten here numerous times and the food is always wonderful.

Went with a party of 7 for brunch. Beautiful outdoor seating. Due to the party size, they only had seating indoors, which was fine considering the heat. Food took a little long to come out, but was definitely worth it. Everyone enjoyed …

Very disappointed. Me and my son went there for lunch on 5/18/16. First the hostess seats us outside instead of the upper porch like the folks that were ''dressed'' business attire. Me and my son ordered the Reuben sandwiches. There was TWO …
Nice venue!  Horrible parking!  They hold wedding events and have only 5 dedicated parking spaces at the discretion of the host.  Plan to pay 10 bucks to park to attend an event here!
Wonderful food!!
If you catch them when they are open  then it's worth it. On the pricey side but I promise that you won't find another place like this in downtown greenville.
Such a cute restaurant. The staff was friendly and the food is really good. We all had an amazing time there. It has a lot of charm.
Food was good not enough choices crab cakes to small couldn't tast the crab. Service was very good.

Mary -  I just want to thank you and your staff for the wonderful rehearsal dinner on Friday night, May 30th.    The food was delicious and your staff was very attentive. We received many compliments on the menu selections, as the broccoli …

This is a really neat little restaurant right at the Falls Park in Greenville.  You can get a very good lunch here.  They have brunch-type food as well as more lunch-type fare.  The food is outstanding and the service is also great.  They have tables both outside and in.   Definitely a great spot to check out.
